name: Cyber Jump (Aucer)
description:
Game introduction:

In 2XXX years, the superintelligence that manages human cities, Akoya, went crazy. It starts to forced humans to wear high-cut pants. Those who did not want to wear that kind of shame formed a rebellion. The Resistance sent the most agile agent(You) to the tower where the artificial intelligence is located. The goal is to shut down the power supply of artificial intelligence at the top of the tower to end this farce.

Operation:

Players use left and right buttons (Swipe left or right on Mobile/Pad)to move and use the blank button  (Swipe up) to jump up.

Goal:

 Move to the top of the tower to win. 

Beware, if you get a hit, the game will instantly end.

Game Info:

Single-player

The duration time of this game is about 3 minutes.

Good luck~

Production list: Zhan Liwei, Ho Zhengyi, Fan Jiangxing Ci, Lai Jiayu
